career.description: Gained experience in chip design and technology development

CEO of NVIDIA, leading AI revolution with GPUs and AI applications

attributes.management_style: Prefers many direct reports to reduce layers and improve information flow
notable_quotes: The more direct reports the CEO has, the less layers are in the company.
It allows us to keep information fluid, allows us to make sure that everyone is empowered by information.
attributes.meeting_style: Does not schedule one-on-one meetings with direct reports unless requested
notable_events: Signed a permanent marker autograph on a woman's chest at a tech expo in Taipei in June 2024
Hand-delivered an early Nvidia supercomputer to OpenAI in 2016
attributes.compensation_policy: increases company’s spend on operating expenses every year to take care of employees
notable_facts: Sent to a boarding school in rural Kentucky for troubled youth shortly after arriving in the U.S.
Worked as a waiter at Denny's to overcome shyness
attributes.award_reason: Shaping accelerated computing, the foundation of modern artificial intelligence
